extName.description: Extension name (doesn't really need to be translate)

noCacheAvailable.message: Sorry, no cache is available for this page.
noCacheAvailable.description: String inside the popup when no cache available

contextMenu.description: String displayed in the context menu

checkBoxCacheBrowsing.description: Ask user to enable/disable the constant redirection

checkBoxAutoDetection.description: Ask user to enable/disable autodetection of unavailable pages
